articles.title: PGA Tour docks Cameron Smith two shots for bad drop in third round of FedEx St. Jude Championship
articles.description: The PGA Tour penalized Cameron Smith two shots at the FedEx St. Jude Championship on Sunday upon learning he took a drop in the wrong place after hitting into the water on the par-3 fourth hole in the third round Saturday.

articles.description: Erik ten Hag cancelled a planned day off for his Manchester United squad following the defeat at Brentford, sources have told ESPN.

articles.title: U.S. women's hockey coach John Wroblewski sidelined by COVID-19
articles.description: The United States women's national hockey team took the ice for the first time Sunday to prepare for the world championships without new coach John Wroblewski, who tested positive for COVID-19.

articles.title: Teofimo Lopez posts seventh-round TKO of Pedro Campa, rebounds from first pro defeat
articles.description: Former champion Teofimo Lopez, 25, rebounded from his first pro defeat with a seventh-round TKO of Mexican journeyman Pedro Campa, 30, on Saturday night in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
Former champion Teofimo Lopez rebounded from his first pro defeat with a seventh-round TKO of Mexican journeyman Pedro Campa on Saturday in Las Vegas.

articles.title: Jacob deGrom dominates again with 10 K's as New York Mets edge Philadelphia Phillies
articles.description: Jacob deGrom struck out 10 in six dominant innings and Edwin Díaz earned his 200th career save, helping the New York Mets beat the Philadelphia Phillies 1-0 on Saturday night.
